statements.statement: with temp as (Select p.ProductNo,--商品编号 p.ProductModel as GoodsNo,--商品货号 p.ProductName,--商品名称 e.productShowPic as ProductPicFile, --图片 spb.BrandCnName,--中文名称名称 spb.BrandEnName, --英文品牌名称 e.FirstShelfDate, --第一次上架时间 row_number() over(order by e.FirstShelfDate desc) as row FROM SpProduct p with(nolock) LEFT JOIN SpBrand spb with(nolock) ON p.BrandNo=spb.BrandNo LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend e with(nolock) ON p.ProductNo=e.ProductNo WHERE e.ProductNo IN( --找到符合条件的条件的ProductNo SELECT DISTINCT(b.ProductNo) FROM SpfSkuExtend b with(nolock) WHERE b.PcSaleState=2 AND b.PcShowState=1 And b.DataState=1 AND b.ProductNo in (SELECT c.ProductNo FROM SpfProductExtend c with(nolock) LEFT JOIN SpProduct d with(nolock) ON c.ProductNo=d.ProductNo where c.ProductNo not in (Select ProductNo from SWfsNewProductManage with(nolock) where BrandNo=@BrandNo and DateShelf between @dayStartDate and @dayEndtDate) and c.TypeFlag=1 and c.DataState=1 and c.[Status]=1 and d.BrandNo=@BrandNo AND FirstShelfDate between @startDate and @endDate #if($Keyword!='') and (d.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or d.ProductNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or d.ProductModel like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and d.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and d.ProductSex=@Gender #end ) ) )select * from temp where row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(b.ProductNo)) FROM SpfSkuExtend b with(nolock) WHERE b.PcSaleState=2 and b.DataState=1 AND b.PcShowState=1 AND b.ProductNo in (SELECT c.ProductNo FROM SpfProductExtend c with(nolock) LEFT JOIN SpProduct d with(nolock) ON c.ProductNo=d.ProductNo where c.ProductNo not in (Select ProductNo from SWfsNewProductManage with(nolock) where BrandNo=@BrandNo and DateShelf between @dayStartDate and @dayEndtDate) and c.TypeFlag=1 and c.DataState=1 and c.[Status]=1 and d.BrandNo=@BrandNo AND c.FirstShelfDate between @startDate and @endDate #if($Keyword!='') and (d.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or d.ProductNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or d.ProductModel like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and d.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and d.ProductSex=@Gender #end )
Select Count(ProductNo) from SWfsNewProductManage with(nolock) where BrandNo=@BrandNo and ProductNo=@ProductNo and DateShelf=@DateShelf
select top 1 * from SWfsNewProductManage(nolock) where BrandNo=@BrandNo and DateShelf between @startDate and @endDate order by sort desc

Select e.Id, a.ProductNo,--商品编号 a.ProductModel as GoodsNo,--商品货号 a.ProductName,--商品名称 b.BrandCnName,--中文名称名称 b.BrandEnName,--英文品牌名称 c.productShowPic as ProductPicFile, --图片 e.dateShelf, e.BrandNo, e.Sort, row_number() over(order by Sort asc) as row from SWfsNewProductManage e with(nolock) left join SpProduct a with(nolock) on e.ProductNo=a.ProductNo left join SpBrand b with(nolock) on e.BrandNo=b.BrandNo LEFT JOIN SpfProductExtend c with(nolock) ON a.ProductNo=c.ProductNo where e.BrandNo=@BrandNo and e.DateShelf between @startDate and @endDate and b.IsShow=1 and b.DataState=1 and b.IsValid=1 #if($Keyword!='') and (a.ProductName like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductNo like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%' or a.ProductModel like '%'+@KeyWord+ '%') #end #if($CategoryNo !='') and a.CategoryNo like '%' + @CategoryNo + '%' #end #if($Gender !='') and a.ProductSex=@Gender #end
Select Count(ProductNo) from SWfsNewProductManage with(nolock) where BrandNo=@BrandNo and SWfsNewProductManage.DateShelf between @startDate and @endDate

with temp as( SELECT a.DateShelf,a.BrandNo,count(a.ProductNo) as count,b.Sort,row_number() over(Order by a.DateShelf DESC, b.Sort asc) as row FROM SWfsNewProductManage a with(nolock) left join SWfsNewBrandManage b with(nolock) on a.brandNo=b.brandNo left join SpBrand spb with(nolock) on a.brandNo=spb.brandNo left join SpBrandExtend spe with(nolock) on spb.brandNo=spe.brandNo where 1=1 and spb.IsShow =1 AND spb.DataState =1 AND spb.IsValid =1 --AND spe.IsSupportShangPin =1 #if($BrandNo!='') and a.BrandNo=@BrandNo #end #if($StartDate!='') and a.DateShelf>=@StartDate #end #if($EndDate!='') and @EndDate>=a.DateShelf #end Group by a.DateShelf,a.BrandNo,b.Sort having count(a.ProductNo)>=10 )select * from temp where row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize

with temp as( SELECT a.DateShelf,a.BrandNo,count(a.ProductNo) as count,b.Sort,row_number() over(Order by a.DateShelf DESC, b.Sort asc) as row FROM SWfsNewProductManage a with(nolock) left join SWfsNewBrandManage b with(nolock) on a.brandNo=b.brandNo left join SpBrand spb with(nolock) on a.brandNo=spb.brandNo left join SpBrandExtend spe with(nolock) on spb.brandNo=spe.brandNo where 1=1 and spb.IsShow =1 AND spb.DataState =1 AND spb.IsValid =1 --AND spe.IsSupportShangPin =1 #if($BrandNo!='') and a.BrandNo=@BrandNo #end #if($StartDate!='') and a.DateShelf>=@StartDate #end #if($EndDate!='') and @EndDate>=a.DateShelf #end Group by a.DateShelf,a.BrandNo,b.Sort having count(a.ProductNo)>=10 )select count(*) from temp
Select Min(sort) from SWfsNewProductManage with(nolock) where BrandNo=@BrandNo and dateshelf between @startDate and @endDate
